entities.name: auntie muriel
entities.description: Auntie Muriel is mentioned as commenting on the dress of Ginevra. She says that her tiara sets off the whole thing nicely, but also criticizes Ginevra's dress as being too low-cut.

entities.name: ginevra
entities.description: Ginevra is mentioned as wearing a dress that auntie Muriel finds to be too low-cut. Ginny glances around and winks at Harry, suggesting that she may have been the one who wore the dress.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as glancing around and winking at Harry. She seems to be enjoying herself, but also appears to be hiding something (perhaps the fact that she wore Ginevra's dress).

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being present at the wedding and interacting with Ginny. He seems to be lost in thought, remembering afternoons spent alone with Ginny.

entities.name: william arthur
entities.description: William Arthur is mentioned as being married to Fleur Isabelle. The ceremony is described in detail, including the declaration of their bond for life.

entities.name: fleur isabelle
entities.description: Fleur Isabelle is mentioned as being married to William Arthur. She is described as being beautiful and elegant.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as making a loud noise with his handkerchief, causing everyone to turn around.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as beaming at Harry and having tears in her eyes. She seems to be happy for the couple getting married.

entities.name: madame delacour
entities.description: Madame Delacour is mentioned as sobbing quietly into a piece of lace, along with Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as sobbing quietly into a piece of lace, along with Madame Delacour.

relationships.description: Harry and Ginny seem to have had a romantic connection in the past, as evidenced by Harry's memories of spending afternoons alone with her.
William Arthur and Fleur Isabelle are getting married, as described in the ceremony. They are declared to be bonded for life.
Hagrid is mentioned as taking out a large handkerchief, which he uses to make a loud noise.
